2152.title: CNN may collect your device fingerprint.

tosdr.tldr: "We [..] may use automated means to collect [...] network or Internet protocol address and type of browser you are using (e.g., Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Internet Explorer), the type of operating system you are using, (e.g., Microsoft Windows or Mac OS), the name of your Internet service provider (e.g., Comcast, Verizon or AT&T) [...], device settings, browser settings, the web pages of the Services you have visited, Services visited before and after you visit a Service, the type of handheld or mobile device used to view the Service (e.g., iOS, Android), location information, and the content and advertisements you have accessed, seen, forwarded and/or clicked on."

4695.quoteText: THESE TERMS OF USE ARE SUBJECT TO BINDING ARBITRATION AND A WAIVER OF CLASS ACTION RIGHTS AS DETAILED IN SECTIONS 11 and 12 .
4695.title: You wave your right to a class action.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.

4696.quoteText:
Changes to Terms of Use.
CNN may modify the Terms of Use, or any part thereof, or add or remove terms at any time, and such modifications, additions or deletions will be effective immediately upon posting.
Your use of the Site after such posting shall be deemed to constitute acceptance by you of such modifications, additions or deletions.
4696.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: Quoted, "Changes to Terms of Use. CNN may modify the Terms of Use, or any part thereof, or add or remove terms at any time, and such modifications, additions or deletions will be effective immediately upon posting."

4697.quoteText:
You agree not to upload, post or otherwise transmit any User Content that:
  • violates or infringes in any way upon the rights of others, including any statements which may defame, harass, stalk or threaten others.

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

4698.quoteText:
You shall be responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your user name(s) or password(s), if any.
You are responsible for all use of Your Account, regardless of whether you authorized such access or use, and for ensuring that all use of Your Account complies fully with the provisions of these Terms of Use.

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

4700.quoteText:
advocates violent behavior.
  • poses a reasonable threat to personal or public safety.
  • contains violent images of killing or physical abuse that appear to have been captured solely, or principally, for exploitive, prurient, or gratuitous purposes.

tosdr.case: Prohibits the posting of content which promotes or glorifies violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
